resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/684599662</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>684599662</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206968</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">SEAsite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SEAsite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SEAsite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SEAsite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SEAsite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SEAsite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">SEAsite</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers language instruction materials as well as cultural, political, and social information about countries in Southeast Asia including Thailand, Indonesia, Burma, Vietnam, and the Philippines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet Sprachenanweisung Materialien sowie die 
kulturellen, politischen und Sozialinformationen über Länder in 
Südostasien einschließlich Thailand, Indonesien, Birma, Vietnam und 
die Philippinen an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre des matériaux d'instruction de langage 
aussi bien que des informations culturelles, politiques, et sociales 
sur des pays en Asie du Sud-Est comprenant la Thaïlande, 
l'Indonésie, la Birmanie, le Vietnam, et les Philippines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece materiais da instrução da língua 
as.well.as a informação cultural, política, e social sobre países 
em Ásia do sudeste including Tailândia, Indonésia, Burma, Vietnam, 
e as Filipinas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre i materiali di istruzione di linguaggio 
così come le informazioni culturali, politiche e sociali sui paesi in
Asia sudorientale compreso la Tailandia, l'Indonesia, la Birmania, il 
Vietnam e le Filippine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει τα υλικά γλωσσικής οδηγίας καθώς επίσης 
και τις πολιτιστικές, πολιτικές, και κοινωνικές πληροφορίες για 
τις χώρες στη Νοτιοανατολική Ασία συμπεριλαμβανομένης της 
Ταϊλάνδης, της Ινδονησίας, της Βιρμανίας, του Βιετνάμ, και των 
Φιλιππινών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece los materiales de la instrucción del 
lenguaje así como la información cultural, política, y social sobre
países en Asia suroriental incluyendo Tailandia, Indonesia, Birmania,
Vietnam, y las Filipinas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206968</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>684599662</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/seasite</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
